title.jp: Yoru to Shinrenzoku Satsujin Jiken Noragami Suspense Gekijou

synopsis: Hiyori and her parents go to a ski resort where she unexpectedly meets Yato and Yukine as well as Kofuku, Daikoku, Tenjin, Kazuma and Bishamon. A mysterious man attacks Yato but freaks out when he sees Yato hasn't died. The mysterious man then starts to plan many different ways to kill of the oblivious god.
Yato invites Hiyori to Capypa Land, much to Hiyori's horror, as that was where she was unwillingly kissed.
